course_description: This course focuses on three components in achieving a Total Wellness Lifestyle.  The first is the mind. The second component is the body. The third component is the spirit.  Students are encouraged to develop physical skills that also enhance the student's psychological and emotional well-being.
sections: Class Nbr: 5530, Section #: 1, Type: PE, Campus: OXF, Meets: MW 1-2:15p, Instructor: R. Geiger, Status: Open
